Mr. Drake was born on September 24, 1924. On June 6, 1942, he  enlisted in the United States Navy at the age of 17. He went on to  serve with distinction as a Petty Officer Second Class, participating  in several major campaigns, including the Atlantic Invasion of North  Africa and the pivotal battles of Iwo Jima and Okinawa in the Pacific…

That fact was clearly demonstrated during the response to the tragic  flooding in Texas over the Fourth of July holiday weekend.
